settings.title: Can I purchase all brands present on your B2B store?
settings.content: You can only purchase the brand(s) you have been approved for, however if you are looking to become a stockist of another brand please contact your relevant account manager.

settings.title: Do I have to agree to any Terms of Trade?
settings.content:
Upon checkout, you will be asked to agree to our Terms of Trade. These can be found at the footer of the B2B.

Please be aware that if you break these Terms of Trade, access to our B2B store can be revoked.

settings.title: Do you have a minimum order?
settings.content: There isn't a minimum order, however orders under £300.00 will incur a £10.00 delivery charge. Orders over £300.00, which is our advisory minimum order, will include free delivery.

settings.title: Do I have to pay import tax?
settings.content: No, the prices you see on our B2B store are the prices you pay, plus VAT. Import taxes have already been paid (excluding Republic of Ireland).

settings.title: How long does delivery take?
settings.content:
The products listed on the B2B website are dispatched from our UK warehouse. We aim to send all in-stock items within 1-3 business days. Please be aware that during peak trading, this may differ.

If you are waiting on your order that has been dispatched, please check your tracking information which will have been emailed to you.

Our operational hours are Monday to Friday.

settings.title: Where can I access product catalogues, images, product specifications and RRPs?
settings.content: Product specifications can be found under the individual product information on the B2B. You can also access this information via the brand dropdown.

settings.title: Who do I contact regarding queries?
settings.content:
• For all queries relating to orders and deliveries, please contact customerservice@hausdistribution.com
  • For queries regarding your account, please contact your relevant account manager or email operations@hausdistribution.com
  • For queries relating to imagery, press and marketing, please contact marketing@hausdistribution.com

settings.title: How can I find out if a particular product is coming back into stock?
settings.content:
Each product has an estimated back in stock date listed by the product description.

Please note this will be the date in which it is expected to us, so allow for an additional few days before it is delivered to you.

settings.title: Can I pre-order an item?
settings.content: Any pre-orderable item will clearly be listed as available to pre-order. They will include an estimated delivery/dispatch date.

settings.support_hours: Our customer support is available Monday to Friday: 9am-5pm.
